item.title: I Hear Your Heart
item.description: In a world that is beeping and blaring Growing louder every day I cover my ears But none of the noise will go away Sirens, Barking dogs Thank God for the one and only sound that turns it around and makes it right I hear your heart Whisprinâ€™ to me No matter where I may happen to be Sending me love and shining it through I hear your heart Can you hear mine too?
